reviewText: The movie is a good, personal summary of the past 60 years or so of Chinese history seen through the eyes of a tea house. I liked it quite a bit, since it does capture many of the aspects of Chinese character.  (Another movie with a similar theme is "The Umbrella Factory" if you can find it.)
I have watched this several tiimes and it has been useful in both language study and getting a historical perspective on the teahouse tradition.
